Package.Name: Pushover
Package.Author: Sebastien Warin
Package.Description: Send notifications to your devices and friends.

Setting.name: UserId
Setting.description: Your user key (not e-mail address) viewable when logged into the Pushover dashboard

Setting.name: DefaultEmergencyRetry
Setting.description: Specifies how often (in seconds) the Pushover servers will send the same notification to the user if the notification has not been acknowledged and is not expired. This parameter must have a value of at least 30 seconds between retries.

Setting.name: DefaultEmergencyExpiration
Setting.description: Specifies how many seconds your notification will continue to be retried for (every retry seconds). This parameter must have a maximum value of at most 86400 seconds (24 hours).
